results.title: Live Laugh Love Wall Art, Gray Aqua Bedroom Wall Decor, Prints or Canvas, Gray Aqua Bathroom Wall Decor, Flower Wall Decor, Set of 3
results.description:
Live Laugh Love wall art is perfect for decorating any space; from master bedrooms to bathrooms!  These stunning flowers go with any decor, and will look great for many years to come.

Includes 3 pieces of wall art
Available as PRINTS (Frame NOT included) or CANVAS

PRINT OPTION
Printed borderless on a professional lustre photo paper with a fine grain pebble texture.
Features a rich, sharp color that won't fade or yellow and will last for years to come
Prints are water and fingerprint resistant. Always display prints under glass for maximum print life.
If picture frames are shown in a listing photo it is for inspirational purposes only.
Picture frames are not included with the purchase of a listing.

CANVAS OPTION - Ready to hang!
Museum quality gallery wrapped canvas 100% polyester base with a 2x1 weave
Printed on genuine artist canvas using UV resistant archival inks which will not scratch or fade in a lifetime.
Mounted onto a 1-1/4" deep frame with an extra 1/4" bleed around the back.
Frame is built with a solid face to support the canvas and keep it from deforming and loosening.
Finished black backing and comes ready to hang with pre-installed hanging hardware.
Your gallery wrapped canvas will always look as tight and flat as the day it was made.

COLOR OPTIONS
Want different colors? View my COLOR CHART for more options.

Need custom colors? No worries! You are not limited to the colors shown on my color chart. Designs can be matched as closely as possible to your décor. Please provide a link to your décor in the note section during checkout. If you do not have a link and need to send a picture, please include in the note with your order that a picture of your décor has been sent for color matching via Etsy messages.

PLEASE NOTE - Colors on your screen may appear different in print. Some online display images use colors that are not shown on my color chart.
If you do not specify colors, I will create your order with the colors in the first example image of the listing.

Please read my shop POLICIES before checkout.
https://www.etsy.com/shop/lovelyfacedesigns/policy

CHOOSE ANY PRINT OR CANVAS TO CREATE YOUR OWN SET!

results.title: DOWNLOAD LIve Laugh Love Graph Chart Pattern - Afghan
results.description:
***BUY 2 (NON-"CUSTOM" ORDER) PATTERNS, GET 1 FREE***


********INSTANT DOWNLOAD********
My listing is a graph pattern NOT the finished product.

This  pattern can be used in cross stitch, single crochet, half double crochet, afghan stitch (tunisian) crochet as well as knitting.

Graph Size BOTH 150 x 200 AND 120x150 stitches
Size in inches/centimeters depends upon hook/needles as well as the stitches’ tension. 
Be sure to check your gauge before starting.
Rows, columns, border or edging can be added to make the end product larger.

There are no row by row instructions. Each square counts as a stitch.  You count and follow the grids on the graph as you go. 

If you would like this graphic in larger or smaller stitch dimension, feel free to let me know. I would be more than happy to accommodate.  

The PDF files attached are for both sizes and in black & white symbols as well as color blocks.

If you are new to crochet I can include basic tips on starting the pattern as well as tips on changing and carrying colors.  Email me should you need help while working through the pattern.

Let me know if you would prefer to receive through regular mail - there will ba an additional charge.


All sales are final. No returns, refunds or exchanges. If you have any doubt in what you are purchasing please contact me with any questions before doing so.

 
©2013 Made Especially 
All rights reserved on pattern graphs and content in this listing. Seller claims rights on custom orders. Finished products from my patterns may be sold.

results.title: Personalized Keychain, Custom Hand Stamped Copper Keychain, Live Laugh Love, Boyfriend Gift, Art, Boyfriend Gift
results.description:
Currently 1-3 business day turnaround, if you're pressed for time, please send us a message in Etsy and we'll prioritize your order. 

To customize, put the text you would like in the 'note to seller' box during checkout and select the appropriate character count option on the drop down menu on the right. 

All SnappinStudio items are professionally made by our jewelers and one-of-a-kind. They are guaranteed for quality, as all items come sealed and will not tarnish. If you have a strict deadline, let us know and we will let you know if we can meet your deadline. Thanks for stopping by! 

*Live Laugh Love*

****15 character max****

Not sure how many characters the text you'd like is? We've attached a link to a character count below for reference: 
http://www.javascriptkit.com/script/script2/charcount.shtml

This is a beautiful little treasure, custom made for you. Please include the intended use for the charm, so that I can better make the piece to fit your needs.

My creations are all hand made from copper and/or brass. Each saying or name is hand stamped.. no two are exactly the same! Each is special and unique. They can be used as a keychain, bag marker, dog tag... whatever fits your needs!

Custom requests are welcome! Please send questions.

Thank you for looking at my personal creations. 

The dimensions for this keychain
Height: 1"
Width:1"

Much Love,
Kyle Kirby
 SnappinStudio

results.title: Inspirational bangle/bracelet, Live, Laugh, Love bangle/bracelet
results.description:
This cheerful, whimsical bangle is a reminder that three simple words can lift up your mood - live, laugh, love!

The bangle is rhodium plated, and adjustable. I used yellow and orange aurora borealis crystals, and coral and yellow glass beads to add some bright color. I also added a flower and a butterfly wing charm - to add to the overall cheerfulness of this bangle!

Please refer to my shop policies for more information. Don't forget to visit the rest of my store for more unique jewelry - happy shopping!

results.title: This is us. Our Life Our Story Our Home - Vinyl Wall Decal- Living Room Vinyl Wall Decal - Home Decor
results.description:
♥ HOW TO PLACE AN ORDER ♥

1. Choose Size from drop down menu. Please note that decal is not necessarily scaled to any particular size shown in photo. Your decal will be the size that you select from the drop down menu. Please measure your space prior to ordering to ensure it will fit. 

2. Vinyl Colors: Please see drop down menu for vinyl colors. Colors are shown in photos. If you don't see the color you need, please message us to see how we can accommodate your order. 

♥ DISCLAIMER AND ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ♥

Sample photos shown are only for demonstration purposes only. They are not to scale with the size of the item you are purchasing. Please see the sizes available and pre measure your space to ensure the decal will fit where you want it placed. If you don’t see the size you need, please message us to see if we can set up a custom order. 

-	Decals apply to smooth, flat surfaces
-	Decals do not have a background and are one solid color
-	Decals are not reusable
-       If you want to be sure that the vinyl will stick to the surface and want to test it before purchasing a full decal, you can order a sample for $2.00 (this includes shipping the sample).

*Please see our FAQ section below prior to purchasing! 

♥ Please review OUR Shop Policies and Procedures prior to purchasing and feel free to message me with any  questions. Thank you for visiting Riley K Designs! ♥

results.title: Live Love Laugh Acrylic Earrings
results.description:
Our first attempt at jewelry...we're going for quirky!

You get THREE earrings in this set -- we'll leave it to your creativity as to how you'll wear them! (Maybe one ear needs an extra piercing?)

The words live, love and laugh are laser cut vertically from fluorescent colors of 1/8" acrylic, and come attached to fish hook wires. The words are about 1" long.

We will normally send a mixture of colors...or you can convo us if you have your heart set on clear, orange, pink or green. These are a lightweight, fun way to express your view of how to live life!

NOTE: If you purchase 2 of these sets, you will have THREE sets of matching words!

Custom words are a definite possibility for these as well --     bridesmaid's names, Greek sorority letters, team mascot etc. Convo with your ideas-- we can make it happen!

results.title: Love acrylic earrings in fluorescent colors-pink, green, orange & clear
results.description:
"Love"  acrylic earrings...make a statement to the world!

Very lightweight, about 1" long words are made of 1/8" acrylic and come attached to fish hook wires.

Available in clear and these fluorescent colors: pink, green and orange. Colors "glow" a little under a blacklight. Choose your color from the options chart, or convo if you'd like two different colors.

We can make custom earrings as well...Bride &Groom names, Greek Sorority Letters, team mascots, etc. Convo with your ideas, we can make them happen!

See our other listings if you would like earrings that say "Laugh" or "Live" or even "Live Love Laugh."

results.title: Custom charm Amazonite beaded bracelet
results.description:
This beaded bracelet is one of my only bracelets with a customizable charm. It is the perfect addition to any style of outfit. 
Amazonite is known for its healing abilities and is thought to bring money, luck, and overall success. The colors include yellow, orange, blue, green, grey, brown, and black. 

With custom inspiration charms, this bracelet is the perfect gift. You can pick between charms that say dream, strength, love, live, laugh, hope, or courage.

My other amazonite bracelets are listed below. https://www.etsy.com/listing/650800893/amazonite-beaded-bracelet?ref=shop_home_active_28&frs=1 And https://www.etsy.com/listing/648202214/amazonite-bronze-beaded-bracelet?ref=shop_home_active_32&frs=1 

The picture shown is 7 inches and that is the average size of an adult female. If you order a different size the pattern may change slightly.

results.title: CINNAMON IRISH CREAM Type Scented Primitive Crow Live Love Laugh Prim Wax Tarts Melts Fillers
results.description:
*** SHIPPING IS ALMOST ALWAYS CALCULATED HIGH WHEN COMBINING LISTINGS AND I WILL REFUND ANY OVERAGES PAID. ***

These are my handmade highly scented primitive large crow tarts or melts that are made with a special blend of paraffin wax that allows me to add up  to 10% more fragrance than most waxes.
 
They are scented to max with CINNAMON IRISH CREAM- BBW Type. This is a totally delicious blend of rich, creamy decadent french vanilla, Irish cream, laced with hints of sweet cinnamon. So Good!! 

These prim crows have the words "Live" "Love" "Laugh" and "I love prim" on them and they measure  3 1/2 in. Long, 1 in. Wide, 1/2 in. High so they are nice sized. You will receive 8 of them in a cello bag labeled and tied with a homespun bow. They have a dash of cinnamon spice on them too.



These look great as bowl fillers too and smell wonderful just sitting out for display without melting them. They also make great Easter gifts so please be sure to check my other listings for terrific smelling candles and tarts to go with your order.

Want more than 1 set of tarts, no problem! Special orders are always welcome and feel free to email for my scent list : homemadescents [!at] yahoo.com
I am always happy to combine auctions to save you money on shipping fees too!

International Buyers : Please contact me for shipping quote.

Thanks for stopping by! Please do come back again soon.

results.title: Water Bottle, Do More Of What Makes You Happy 001, Choose Joy, Happy Life, Happiness, Gift Idea, Reusable Stainless Steel Soda Bottle
results.description:
Reusable Water Bottle /  Reusable Soda Bottle - Do More Of What Makes You Happy 001, Choose Joy, Happy Life, Happiness, Gift Idea, Stainless Steel Reusable Water Bottle

* Size: 17 oz. ~ 10.5 inch high with lid ~ 9 inch around at widest point
* Available in Stainless Steel or White Coated Stainless Steel
* Custom Design Printed On 2 Sides
* Reusable Water Bottle / Reusable Drink Bottle - Eco Friendly, Save The Planet

See all of our Custom Printed Reusable Water Bottle designs, and other printed gifts in our shop: GroovyGiftables.Etsy.com

----------

Reusable soda bottle style water bottle keeps beverages:
--> cold for up to 24 hours or
--> hot for up to 12.

Vacuum seal keeps liquids and carbonation fresh.
Double Wall Insulated Eliminates Condensation.
100% BPA and Phthalate Free.
Made from double-walled non-leaching and non-toxic 18/8 stainless steel.

- Leak Proof with Secure Easy Twist Top Lid
- Stainless Steel or White Coated Stainless Steel
- Hand Wash recommended
- Metals are not microwave safe
- Reusable Drink Bottle to take your drinks with you on the go for any activity

-- Inks / dyes are transparent and will print more vibrant and bold on white coated items. On metallic base - prints will naturally be more muted due to the base material of the the item itself.

- Keep cold drinks cold for up to 24 hours: water, soda, juice, tea, iced coffee, and ...
- Keep hot drinks hot for up to 12 hours: coffee, cocoa, hot chocolate, tea and ...

----------

★ This custom made design is printed on both sides of the soda bottle / water bottle, which allows the design to be on display as well as seen by the person drinking.
★ Permanent, vibrant, beautiful custom inked design that is bonded to the soda drink bottle professionally with a high heat press, and will not crack or peel off. This design is not created with stickers or vinyl.

----------

Rush or Deadline orders: Please contact me ★ before ★ placing your order, or choose one of our rush options at checkout when available. There will be additional costs for rushing the order processing time and/or for any expedited shipping.

I welcome custom orders or change requests! :) With 19+ years experience in design there is rarely a request I can't accommodate. Please contact me ★ prior ★ to placing your order if you wish to make changes to the mug design in any way. Changes may require additional fees.

This soda bottle / water bottle / drink bottle design is professionally created and printed in the USA.

Each item is made after receiving an order, processing time is needed prior to shipping. Our current processing times are shown in the product listing. Due to the hand made and custom designed nature the items can vary slightly from the picture shown. Monitors may display colors differently than real life.

results.description:
*** SHIPPING IS ALMOST ALWAYS CALCULATED HIGH WHEN COMBINING LISTINGS AND I WILL REFUND ANY OVERAGES PAID. ***

These are my handmade highly scented primitive large crow tarts or melts that are made with a special blend of paraffin wax that allows me to add up  to 10% more fragrance than most waxes.
 
They are scented to max with BLACK LICORICE and have a cinnamon rub on them. WOW! This is a fantastic scent! A strong and very true black licorice scent. Super scent throw.

results.title: Live, Love, Laugh svg, heart cut file, love heart, inspirational words, t-shirt svg, wall art, cut file for cricut silhouette, dxf, png, svg
results.description:
Live, Love, Laugh svg, heart cut file - SVG / DXF for Cricut and Silhouette studio

This listing includes:

1 SVG
1 PNG
1 DXF (compatible with Silhouette Studio)

--- Please make sure your software and machine accepts these formats prior to purchase ---

For personal and limited commercial use (maximum of 100 items per design unless purchasing the extended license with the design)

You may sell physical items, anything that has been printed by you and is photographed as a physical product. We do not allow selling or distributing on any ‘on demand’ printing shop such as Zazzle, CafePress or any other store.

If the files do not work with compatible software, please message me - I will be happy to assist you in fixing the issue :)

These are instant download files and as we cannot retrieve the files, we cannot refund after purchase

--- Terms of Use ---

All designs are property of 1VisionDrive
- You have unlimited personal use
- You may create physical items to sell up to 100 products as a small business with commercial credit
- If you intend to sell more than 100 copies of your product please contact us for pricing

--- Under no circumstances ---

- Sell any product ‘as is’
- Reselling as digital art is prohibited
- You may not sell as a ‘print on demand’ product – you can sell as a finished printed product up to 100 files
- Sell or share these files
- Sell as physical tools (stencils etc) created with these files
- Creating digital printables with the designs is prohibited. 
- Do not give away or distribute the files as stand alone or a set.

We retain full ownership of all designs/files.

results.title: Custom Wood Sign Live Laugh Love Family Name Couples Name Est Date Hand Painted Rustic Home Decor Original Design
results.description:
Be Joyful In Hope Patient In Affliction Faithful In Prayer Romans 12:12 Hand Painted Rustic Wood Sign 12x12 Home Decor Original Design featuring original hand lettered typography, designed by Lorelei Conover Creative.

This rustic home decor is perfect for decorating your space, for Christmas gifts, or anytime gifts to family and friends.

Product Details

* Measures 11x14
* Sawtooth hanger installed on the back so your piece is ready to hang
* Because of the uniqueness of this item, no two signs are alike, and will minimally vary in letter writing and placement

This is a hand made item, so slight variations will occur in the writing and placement of letters. I strive to come as close to the sample photo you see but every item is unique and it's impossible to replicate each piece exactly as shown, especially with the variations of hand lettering. This also applies to the actual wood board's shape, surface texture, and size, although yours will be within the listed dimension's size range. Convo me with any questions you may have, thanks!


Please allow 5-7 business days for production time before this item is shipped. It will then be wrapped with loving care and shipped to the mailing address registered with Etsy. (If you prefer your item to mailed elsewhere, please convo me first!)

If you are local to Walnut/Diamond Bar, Ca and can arrange to pick up your item when it's ready, then use coupon code LCCLOCAL to remove the shipping cost!


*********
Follow me here for coupons, contests, and freebies!
Instagram: @loreleicreative
Facebook: facebook.com/loreleicreative


Thank you for checking out my shop!

Cheers
Lorelei

❤ Description ❤

Rules of Life Lime

5x7 inches

❤ Printing Process ❤

The final project of the artwork will be determined by the quality of the printer and either the paper or card that you choose. Please keep in mind that colors on a monitor may vary slightly from how they appear in person or how they display on viewing device to another due to color calibration of your device or monitor. For the most visually stunning final results, we recommend printing the pages using high-quality paper, such as cardstock.

Please note, this listing is for an instant download, no print will be mailed. You can print at home, print shop, or online service such as the following:

*Vista Print
*Shutterfly
*Snapfish


❤ Unlimited amount of copies can be made ❤


❤ Refunds and Exchanges ❤


Every printable purchase is non-refundable, as there is no way for me to tell whether you have printed the design.

Thank you so much for stopping by! Please don't hesitate to message me with any questions or concerns.
